price: Und Wir sandten ja bereits Nuh zu seinem Volk: Ich bin euch ja ein deutlicher Warner:
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
